__e: Because Al Baxter is the angriest guy I know.
OK. Baxter came down here. He came up behind Carl.
In fact, every time I saw the movie, I kept thinking "Tom Baxter's so handsome. "
I also know that's why Baxter and the feds want you to testify.
Somebody gave you up at the safe house, but it wasn't Baxter, it wasn't me, all right ?
Mr. Baxter's old and difficult, and because of that, he was dismissed out of hand.
I can't make a decision, Baxter, until you tell me the whole truth.
I hope Miss Baxter's not all we've got between us and trouble.
To be honest, I don't know why I haven't dismissed you out of hand.
